0.9.name: wordpress/dutchdate
0.9.description: Using an English Wordpress install and publishing posts in Dutch? Those pesky English dates produced by <?php the_time(); ?> and <?php the_date(); ?> were getting on my nerves too, hence this plugin. Automatically converts english months and days (except for the initials, so far) to their dutch equivalent.
